channel.title: Shop prices
channel.description:
how do i edit shop prices, i know how to edit items just not how to make the prices change
what folder?
Thanks..

item.title: Shop prices
item.dc:creator: @I_Hawk_I I Hawk I
item.description:
@I_Hawk_I wrote:

Insert Quote how do i edit shop prices, i know how to edit items just not how to make the prices change

what folder?

Thanks…

If you know how to edit items, then you shouldnt have a problem. Merely go into your Item.cfg file

item = # [Item Name] [Item Description] A B C

this here is what you know as your item.cfg layout, of course with a few more numbers on the end, but all needed is here.
These are just the 3 numbers that come after The Item name and description

B = Shop Sell Price

A and C… one is shops Buy Price and other, is usually about the same number but not quite sure of the use.

Read full topic
